testcase.name: LAX validation tests
testcase.description: Test that LAX validation is performed

variation.name: v01-label-undefined-attribute
variation.description: Label has an attribute which is undefined. Linkbase schema allows anyAttribute of xml namespace with lax processing.

variation.name: v02-label-invalid-xmlspace-attribute
variation.description: same as V-01 but has an invalid value in xml:space attribute (lax)

variation.name: v03-label-valid-xml-lang-attribute
variation.description: same as V-01 but has an valid value in xml:lang attribute (lax). (note that the original xs:language pattern would have failed this code, but the errata in http://www.w3.org/2001/05/xmlschema-errata#E2-25 makes this value legal)

variation.name: v04-label-invalid-xml-lang-attribute
variation.description: same as V-01 but has an invalid value in xml:lang attribute (lax)
